Node.definition: = a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which an object is able to withstand force
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success

Node.gloss: to place (in a position)|to make|to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside

meaning unsure; probably: = a structure surrounding a town, outside the main wall; ◄ made out of of stones or bricks; ► provides strength and security to the town; ≈ sometimes used metaphorically to denote someone who offers protection

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= state in which humans are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their actions
literally: form; hence: = a certain pattern of events imagined by the human mind, ◄ described as an artifact shaped from clay by an artisan

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be encouraged|to rely on|to depend on
Node.definition: = process by which humans receive mental strength as a result of the help provided by others

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= state in which humans have confidence in God; ≈ regarded as positive
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= short form of יהוה (יהוה) only found in poetic texts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
figurative extension of a rock as place of refuge: = deity that protects and provides refuge
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to goes to reach (the ground); hence: = causative action by which deities cause a high building to be completely destroyed until only rubble remains; ≈ associated with total humiliation
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
= the lower part of the leg beyond the ankle, on which humans or animals stand and with which they walk
= a person or class of people that lack the means to support themselves; ≈ thereby often despised or mistreated, but being under God's protection
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which an object has a relativedly flat surface, where people and objects can move without obstacles; ≈ associated with security and propsperity
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right
= pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

Node.gloss: to look for|to wait for|to hope for
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
literally: remembrance; hence: = appellation through which one can be remembered
= state in which humans experience a desire to see something happen or do something oneself; ◄ this desire is associated with one's heart (לֵב) or throat (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

= state in which humans and deities experience a desire to possess something, to live somewhere, or to associate with someone; ◄ this desire is associated with one's נֶפֶשׁ (נֶפֶשׁ) ≈ and can be both good and evil
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= the outcome of a dispute between two or more parties, decided by a judge or a deity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= particle marking a proposition as not true

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: (one's) (right) hand is raised; hence: = state in which humans or deities are victorious in battle
literally: (to do something with) raised hand; hence: = state in which humans or deities perform an action with confidence
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= process by which someone perceives an important object with the eyes, or witnesses an event of some significance
= process by which someone perceives an important object with the eyes, or witnesses an event of some significance

Node.gloss: to be ashamed|to come to shame|to be put to shame|to be disappointed
Node.definition: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

= process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which someone exercises authority over other people
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= marker indicating that an object or event is not included in a range of objects or events
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= particle marking a proposition as not true

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence

= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
= process in which information that is stored in one's mind regarding someone or something is being reprocessed continually and/or repeatedly
= action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to be honorable|to be worthy of honor|to be renowned
Node.definition: = state in which humans and deities are regarded as worthy of honor and respect

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= state in which humans long for a person, object that is or appears to be absent, or for an event that does no longer take place

Node.gloss: to pour out (a prayer) > to pray
Node.definition: = action by which humans let words flow from their mouths ◄ as if they were a liquid
= action by which people talk softly among themselves to keep others from overhearing

= causative action by which deities offer primarily verbal instruction to humans, which may occasionally be accompanied by physical punishment, given as a result of misbehavior or to prevent misbehavior, ► aimed to teach the receiver (and sometimes other people as well) wisdom and good behavior
= state in which someone is pregnant
literally: to draw near; hence: = state in which a person is about to perform an activity
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

= process by which human have painful contractions of the womb, ◄ which is caused by an advanced state of pregnancy ► and results in birth of new offspring; ≈ associated with anguish, trembling, suffering, and fear
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= experience of having painful contractions of the womb; ◄ caused by advanced state of pregnancy; ► and resulting in the birth of new offspring; ≈ associated with fear and agony
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= process by which someone becomes pregnant

Node.gloss: to tremble|to be distressed|to be in anguish
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience strong fear and distress, ◄ compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing, and trembling
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

= a natural movement of air, blowing in a particular direction, ranging in intensity from a light breeze to a heavy blast ; ≈ often regarded as the breath of God, but also associated with things that are without substance and cannot be grasped
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue or protection (of humans in need) implying success
= particle marking a proposition as not true

Node.gloss: to cause to happen|to bring about
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause events to take place without them having to necessarily be involved in the event itself

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: to fall; hence: = process by which humans are brought forth from the womb
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= the dead body of humans or animals
= process by which humans open their eyes after sleep; ≈ also used in the figurative sense of becoming active after a period of inactivity, and of being restored to life after having died
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to drop; hence: = causative process by which humans bring forth children from the womb
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building
= causative action by which humans or deities close the entrance to a space with the help of a door (דֶּלֶת)

= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a town, building, or room; ◄ usually made out of wood, but occasionally also out of metal; ► provides or prevents access; ≈ sometimes associated with vulnerability
= path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space
= action by which humans go to a location where they will not be readily seen by others, ► in order to be safe from danger or to attack someone else
= relatively low frequency of events or short duration of an event
= a very short length of time
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= action by which humans or deities express their intense anger; ◄ caused by someone else's behavior, ► almost invariably resulting in punishment for the party that is responsible
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= causative action by which a human being or deity causes an object or event to become visible to others

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
